pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gold Price Data // A collection of gold price data in various currencies in the form of USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, CAD, CHF, INR, CNY, TRY, SAR, IDR, AED, THB, VND, EGP, KRW, RUB, ZAR, and AUD. This data comes from the World Gold Council. In addition, the data is in the form of daily, weekly, monthly (average and the end of period), quarterly (average and the end of period), and yearly (average and the end of period).
